A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just saw The Last Jedi. I have to say that it was pretty disappointing\, and really my least favorite of all the Star Wars movies. Overall it's a good movie\, just not a good Star Wars movie. All of the cliffhangers from Episode VII are just tossed away - Rey's family\, Snoke's identity. This movie is really an insult to prior storylines. Episode VII was just a remake of episode IV\, but at least honored some of Lucas' vision. The Disney monopoly has just ruined Star Wars from here on and lost me as a fan.
